summary: This mod either removes projectile trails completely or enables them all the time. Your choice.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=15]What does this mod do?[/size] [/b]

[size=5]This mod either [b]removes projectile trails completely[/b]
or [b]enables them all the time.[/b]

Your choice.
[/size]

[u][size=8]Introduction:[/size][/u]

[u][size=4] So have you ever seen real Arrows leaving behind a trail? I haven´t.[/u]
[color=green][b]ProjectileTrails - Never[/b][/color] will remove* the trail effect from all projectiles.

[u]Don´t care about realism in Skyrim and like the trails, even can´t get enough of them?[/u]
[color=green][b]ProjectileTrails - Ever[/b][/color] will make the projectiles leave behind a trail no matter the speed or distance they fly.
CLARIFICATION:
The trail will not reach from the shooter to the impact place.
It still has vanilla lenght, sticks to the projectile and disappears after impact.[/size]


[u][size=8]Requirements:[/size][/u]
[size=4]Nothing special required to run this mod.[/size]


[u][size=8]Compatibility:[/size][/u]
[size=4]Compatible with everything.[/size]


[u][size=8]Bugs:[/size][/u]
[size=4]With [color=green][b]ProjectileTrails - Ever[/b][/color] sometimes trails won´t show when shooting the projectile. I don´t know why that is.[/size]



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*does not really remove the trail, rather makes the conditions for the trail to show up extremely hard to meet. :)
author: Dani - Gruberix
